column3: Nebo kotow; hɔn ehonyi soso adzesoa mbowa
column4: na anantwi: ndzɛmba a hom soso no yɛ dur
column5: adzesoa durdur ma mbowa a wɔaberɛ."

column3: wɔbɔ mu butuw; wonnkotum eyi adzesoa durdur no

column4: na Israel fie nkaa nyinara hɔn a metur hɔn fi yafun mu

column2: "na ɔdze kodu nkɔdaayɛ mu mpo emi nye no
column3: na ɔdze kodu gon no mfuwii mu mpo
column4: mobɔbɔ wo akɔnkɔn: emi na mayɛ wo

column2: "Woana na hom dze me bɔto no ho
"Hɔn a wohue sika fi foto mu
column3: na woker dwetɛ wɔ nsɛn mu

column4: na wɔdze no kesi ne sibea
column5: na ogyina hɔ; onnkotum efi ne sibea efi: nyew
column6: sɛ obi tsea mu frɛ no a
column8: anaaso ɔnngye no mmfi no fona mu."

column2: "Hom nkaakaa kankan tsetse ndzɛmba no: osiandɛ emi nye Nyankopɔn
column3: na obi nnyi hɔ bio; emi nye Nyankopɔn
column4: na obi nnyi hɔ tse dɛ emi a
column7: na mifi tsetseber do meka dza wonnyae nnyɛe no kyerɛ; dɛ

column3: m'apam mu banyin efi ekyirekyir asaase do; ɛhɛɛ
column5: mebɛma aba mu so; mabɔ tsirmpɔw

column3: hom a hom ntamu nye ɔgye twe:"

column4: na mo nkwagye rinnkyinkyim; na medze nkwagye bɔto Zion ama m'enyimnyam Israel."
